channel.title: Seers Medical – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: Atlanta A&E Patient Trolley
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Atlanta Transport Trolley is suitable for patient examination, full X-Ray and resuscitation, within a variety of acute healthcare departments. The trolley incorporates an easily accessible full length X-Ray cassette platform, is easily manoeuvrable, as the trolley features a 5th wheel steering system and centrally located foot pedals for controlling height adjustment, trendelenburg and reverse trendelenburg tilt. The backrest is fully adjustable to almost 90° with an easily accessbile release lever. A deluxe 100mm mattress with pressure reducing design and a safe working load of 250kg is included as standard. Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model PTX1403 – Standard Model Specification

  • Full length easy accessible X-Ray facility
  • Excellent height range of 58-91 cm
  • Hydraulic foot pedals at both sides of the trolley to adjust height and tilt
  • Moulded easy to clean patient support surface for mattress
  • Trendelenburg tilt of -16°
  • Reverse trendelenburg tilt of +16°
  • Twin Powered gas strut assisted backrest from 0 to +90°
  • Safe working load of 250 kgs
  • Central locking braking wheel system with Tente® 200mm castors and directional lock 5th wheel steering system (dia 125mm)
  • Anti-bacterial wipe clean base cover with integral oxygen cylinder holder (upto size F)
  • Integral fold down side support rails
  • Dual push / pull handles
  • IV pole included as standard with 4 fitting locations and integrated storage tube
  • Storage tray in base cover for patient belongings
  • Dimensions: W77cm x L208cm
  • Wide range of optional accessories
  • Mattress included as Standard

Optional Accessories

  • Additional IV Pole with (Model PT1410)
  • Additional Push and pull transport handle (Model PT1490)
  • Paper Roll Holder (Model PT1405)
  • Monitor shelf (Model PT1440)
  • DIN rail attachment for ventilation device (Model PT1460)
  • Replacement AtlantaFlex Deluxe 100mm Mattress (Model PT1470)

item.title: Atlanta Transport Trolley
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Atlanta Transport Trolley is suitable for patient examination, treatment, recovery and transportation within a variety of acute healthcare departments. Easily manoeuvrable, the trolley features a 5th wheel steering system and centrally located foot pedals for controlling height adjustment, trendelenburg and reverse trendelenburg tilt. The backrest is fully adjustable to almost 90° with an easily accessbile release lever. A deluxe 100mm mattress with pressure reducing design and a safe working load of 250kg is included as standard. Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model PT1402 – Standard Model Specification

  • Excellent height range of 52-85 cm
  • Hydraulic foot pedals at both sides of the trolley to adjust height and tilt
  • Moulded easy to clean patient support surface for mattress
  • Trendelenburg tilt of -16°
  • Reverse trendelenburg tilt of +16°
  • Twin Powered gas strut assisted backrest from 0 to +90°
  • Safe working load of 250 kgs
  • Central locking braking wheel system with Tente® 200mm castors and directional lock 5th wheel steering system (dia 125mm)
  • Anti-bacterial wipe clean base cover with integral oxygen cylinder holder (upto size F)
  • Integral fold down side support rails
  • Dual push / pull handles
  • IV pole included as standard with 4 fitting locations and integrated storage tube
  • Storage tray in base cover for patient belongings
  • Dimensions: W77cm x L208cm
  • Wide range of optional accessories
  • Mattress included as Standard

Optional Accessories

  • Additional IV Pole with (Model PT1410)
  • Additional Push and pull transport handle (Model PT1490)
  • Paper Roll Holder (Model PT1405)
  • Monitor shelf (Model PT1440)
  • DIN rail attachment for ventilation device (Model PT1460)
  • Replacement AtlantaFlex Deluxe 100mm Mattress (Model PT1470)

item.title: Community Lounge Chairs
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Ideal for all bedside and communal locations in the NHS, nursing homes and residential care environments. Inter changeable seat cushions accommodate medium to high risk patients without changing the seat height. The option of an ergonomically positioned hand bar and optional housekeeping castors allow the chair to be easily moved. The elegant simple design features a fixed back seat angle and is available with high tech durable upholstery. Available with a safe working load upgrade to 225Kg (35 stone).  

Models Available

For all the Lavenham, Ashfield and Rushmere models see price list for full range   Features •   Ideal for all bedside requirements in NHS and care home environments •   Various waterproof and anti-bacterial vinyl and fabric options available •   Interchangeable seat cushions •   Easy to wipe clean •   Anti-bacterial lacquered wooden frames •   Strong and durable wooden design •   Fire retardant to BS 5852 (Crib 5) Optional Accessories •   A range of colours available •   A wide choice of vinyl’s, fabrics and colours •   6 wooden finishes available •   Pressure relief seat cushions •   Seat heights of 41cm and 46cm are also available

item.title: General Care Chairs
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
This hard wearing range of patient chairs is FIRA tested to severe contract standard for strength and stability. Wooden frames are stained and polished to severe contract standard using antibacterial lacquer. Upholstery is designed to minimise seams and stapling. Seat cushions are reversible for product longevity with pressure relief seat foam available as an option.  

Models Available

For all the Brightwell, Elmswell and Bromley models - see price list for full range   Features •   Ideal for all bedside requirements in NHS and nursing home environments •   Various waterproof and anti-bacterial vinyl and fabric options available •   Removable and reversible seat cushions •   Easy to clean and wipe-able •   Anti-bacterial lacquered wooden frames •   Strong and durable wooden design •   Fire retardant to BS 5852 (Crib 5) Optional Accessories • A range of colours available • A wide choice of vinyl’s, fabrics and colours • 6 wooden finishes available • Drop down arm supports • Pressure relief seat cushions • Seat heights of 41cm and 46cm are also available • Housekeeping castors for easy transportation

item.title: Orlando Accident & Emergency Trolley
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: The Orlando Accident & EmergencyTrolley provides patient transportation, examination, an X-Ray facilities within a variety of acute healthcare departments. The design is robust and provides reliability and product longevity. Easily manoeuverable with large Ø200mm tente® castors, the trolley features hydraulic height adjustment as well as trendelenburg tilt to -12º. There is a full X-Ray deck with cassette access on both sides and at eithe end of the trolley. The backrest is manually aadjustable to 85º. The trolley also features chrome fold-down side support rails and has a safe working load of 240kg. Additionally there is a storage basket and optional tray for patient belongings on the base which can also accomodate an oxygen cylinder up to size F. The trolley is supplied with a 100mm foam mattress along with a telescopic IV pole with integral storage on the trolley. Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model PTX4200 – Standard Model Specification

  • Excellent height range of 63-95 cm
  • Hydraulic foot pedal on ones side of the trolley to adjust height
  • Easy to clean patient support surface for mattress
  • Full length X-Ray facility with cassette access from both sides and both ends
  • Trendelenburg tilt of -12° via hand lever at head and foot end of the trolley
  • Adjustable 7 position manual backrest from 0 to +85°
  • Safe working load of 240 kgs
  • Tente® 200mm castors with directional steering system
  • Oxygen cylinder holder (upto size F)
  • Integral fold down side support rails
  • IV pole included as standard with 4 fitting locations and integrated storage tube
  • Storage tray in base cover for patient belongings
  • Dimensions: W82cm x L225cm
  • Mattress included as Standard
  • Wide range of optional accessories

Optional Accessories

  • Additional IV Pole
  • Paper Roll Holder
  • Monitor shelf
  • DIN rail attachment for ventilation device
  • OrlandoFlex Deluxe 250kg pressure reducing mattress

item.title: SEERS 2 & 3 Section Bariatric Couches
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
These products meet the increasing requirements for providing examination couches with the capability of supporting extremely heavy patients. All these models have a safe working load and lifting capacity, from minimum height, of 325kgs (51 stone/715lbs).

Medicare Bariatric Couches - Model Choices

SM3573 - Bariatric 3 section couch with retractable wheels SM3673 - Bariatric 3 section couch with large wheel design SM4542 - Bariatric 2 section couch with retractable wheels SM4642 - Bariatric 2 section couch with large wheel design Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard 3 Section Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (715lbs=51 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Adjustable angle head/foot section from -25 to +75 degrees positive
  • The power assisted foot section incorporates anti-trap design gas strut
  • Electric height elevation from 43-97cm (17”-37”)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 85cm (33”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Standard 2 Section Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (715lbs=51 stone)
  • Adjustable angle electric backrest operation from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Choice of retractable wheel or large wheel design with steering facility
  • Electric height elevation from 43-97cm (17”-37”) and 45-98cm (18”-38”) on large wheel models
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Standard width 1055cm (41”)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model 6207 Double foot switch operation
  • Model 6074 Side support rails (each)
  • Model 6074P Side support rail cushions (each)
  • Model 6077 Deluxe memory foam upholstery

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very stable and rigid simple 2 section examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the choice of a retractable wheel or Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

Medicare 2 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM2550 - Hydraulic Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM2560 - Electric Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM2570 - Electric Elevation, electric backrest, Retract Wheel Base Download PDF   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37 stone)
  • Adjustable head section with positive and negative angle
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Styled Base Shroud

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Therapy Couch – Basic & Plus Models
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: 2 Section Therapy Table - Model Choices ST2558 - Basic head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2568 - Basic head design - electric height elevation ST2559 - Plus head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2569 - Plus head design - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Basic & Plus Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of manual or electric height operation
  • Choice of models both with positive and negative adjustment of head section
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Therapy Couch – Standard Model
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very strong and rigid couch available with a  traditional “Standard” head section design, complete with breathing hole and removable plug for prone treatments.

2 Section Therapy Table - Standard Model Choices

ST2557 - Standard head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2567 - Standard head design - electric height elevation Download PDF

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very stable and rigid simple 3 section examination couch. This couch will provide much assistance in the reduction of manual handling issues, as well as provide a comfortable surface for the patient to be positioned. With the choice of a retractable wheel or Large Wheel Base design, this product is very versatile in various applications when fitted with optional accessories.

Medicare 3 Section Couch - Model Choices

SM3550 - Hydraulic Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM3560 - Electric Elevation, Retract Wheel Base SM3570 - Electric Elevation, electric backrest, Retract Wheel Base   Optional Accessories
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Adjustable backrest with positive negative angle
  • Adjustable foot section with positive and negative angle
  • The power assisted head and foot sections incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 43-97cm (17″-37″)
  • Retractable wheel design with adjustable foot for uneven floors

  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist

Optional Couch Accessories
